Ran update again.  Looks like the first update left the mylar plugins out of sync.

Yup, this is notorious bug 132450 (hence the instructions on the Mylar download page to always use "Search for new features..".  This bug has been fixed in Eclipse and so "Search for updates.." post Mylar 2.0M3 should work on Eclipse 3.3.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 132450 ***
